name: AdrenaRush
description:
AdrenaRush is a first-person fast-paced action prototype inspired by Ghostrunner.

It was made as for a prototype assignment at Futuregames with another student. Our main focus is on the interactions between the camera and the movements to give the player a smooth gameplay experience.

Made by:

https://patrickhalleby.itch.io/
https://jacopocolangelo.itch.io/
